author: mbenson
msg: FastHashMap has been removed in [collections]' trunk; plus class is duplicated in [beanutils].  Switch to beanutils-core (even though FastHashMap is there as well), and [collections] dependency is now eliminated in favor of Concurrent[Hash]Map

msg: SOLR-2110: remove restrictions on local param substitution

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-888. java: async client should also have nonblocking connect
This patch adds optional nonblocking connect behavior.
